name: Hydrogenated styrene-butadiene block copolymers modified with maleic anhydride such that the basic polymers are composed of : 18 to 40 percent by weight of units derived from styrene, 58 to 80 percent by weight of units derived from hydrogenated 1,3-butadiene and 0.1 to 2 percent by weight of units derived from maleic anhydride.
FoodContactSubstance: Hydrogenated styrene-butadiene block copolymers modified with maleic anhydride such that the basic polymers are composed of : 18 to 40 percent by weight of units derived from styrene, 58 to 80 percent by weight of units derived from hydrogenated 1,3-butadiene and 0.1 to 2 percent by weight of units derived from maleic anhydride.
